scripts.repo:lint-files: biome lint --apply --no-errors-on-unmatched --colors=force app core maintenance organizational-structure
scripts.repo:check-files: npx biome check --files-ignore-unknown=true --no-errors-on-unmatched --organize-imports-enabled=false --colors=force app core maintenance organizational-structure
scripts.repo:format-files: biome format --write --no-errors-on-unmatched --colors=force app core maintenance organizational-structure
